title: WBPHIDCL Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Assistant Engineer Posts
description: The West Bengal Police Housing and Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited (WBPHIDCL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Assistant Engineer, Sub-Assistant Engineer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ Diploma, B.E./B. Tech in Electrical, Civil Engineering can apply for the WBPHIDCL Notification 2025 . The interested applicant...
